name: Geo.me Solutions
tag_list: google-maps, web-maps, mapping-softwre, maps, saas, bing-maps, map-applications, mashups
overview:
Web maps made simple.

Geo.me gives you the ability to load and view your locations and information quickly on a web map. Publish private and public maps, such as store finders with features configured to your precise style and needs. Simple to add to any web page with no development skills.

Develop a better understanding of your data with a suite of tools including themed overlays, heat maps and choropleth (or patchwork) maps. Powerful features allow you to compare and contrast your data with other datasets or our shared Open Data.

Take our platform to the next level with innovative solutions to address additional requirements. Use maps as for customer feedback, connect asset tracking systems, optimise routing or embed as part of a business dashboard or CRM.
